doc.title: Memphis Rising: Elvis Returns
doc.plot: Memphis Rising-Elvis Returns is a fantasy musical about Elvis the King of Rock & Roll, the WHAT IF factor. He didn't really die in his Gracland Mansion in 1977 he is still alive and well having an inter-planetary experience on an Alien planet and he is beamed back to earth. on his breif visit back on earth he enters an Elvis tribute contest and and is met with a whole lot of problems, kidnapping and distain from Government Agents interfere, making it quite an adventure. See how the King shakes it up in this tight independent movie. 1:41
